Articles.Content:
Hello! I decided I would make a thread where you would make up stories about your space program! So, with no more to say, so I'll give you mine!

BSMC (Logo coming soon)

It was dark times for KSP. President MacBill O'Kerman had cut funding for KSP. With little options, they considered shutting down, but then how would they return their three Kerbals in the Kerbal Space Station? Then, a new hope was seen. Bio Kerman, A particularly wealthy fan of KSP's Program who donated to KSP commonly had started his own space program, but hadn't been succesful. They signed a contract with his at-the-time unamed company to give 60% of their govermental fundings to his company, IF he would imeadietly work on a space craft to rendevous with the KSS and return their brave kerbals. Then, with a .9 billion dolar budget, they created the Humana III Space craft and returned KSP's kerbals. After their extreme sucess, the company named themselves BSMC (Bio Space Manufacturing Co.). Still a young buisness, they have just made it to the Mun. But, then, KSP got major funding when a new president was elected. They revised the contract, and BSMC took a major blow. Now, only 0.25% of KSP's fundings went to BSMC. BSMC took action and began a new space race with KSP, and with major consequences. There was a bet with BSMC. KSP said, that if BSMC made it to Duna before KSP did, KSP would give 30% of its fundings to BSMC. If KSP won, all fundings to BSMC would be cut. They agreed to the deal. But, fatefully, KSP made it first, and BSMC took it second major blow. Now, BSMC has done barely anything in space, and is a dying company. Thier biggest succes is making an interplanetary probe, whic has yet to fly through Eve's SOI. That is BSMC's story.

Have fun making stories, and I can't wait to see them!

Edited September 30, 2012 by sal_vager

I think you haven't posted the story yet because the spoiler isn't working.

Otherwise, this will be a great thread and I will post my story soon.

Does a Business count? If so Voyager Labs is so in.

Does a Business count? If so Voyager Labs is so in.

Yeah! Buisnesses, Companies, Programs, Organizations, ETC all count!

Edited September 30, 2012 by Bioman222
Spelling error :P

This is the TRUE Origin of Voyager Labs!!!

Not sure how many people remember Robug Labs, But that is besides the point. It was Robug Labs last days and I needed something to get it going off again, I didnt know what to do because I've basicly done it all in 0.16. That's when I started thinking and that is when I saw ISA Map and thought "Hmm a mapping probe possibly" Thus Voyager I was born. That's when I started debating about Robug Labs existence then it hit me "Hmm Voyager I should be new start for me and Robug Labs" I Renamed Robug Labs to "Voyager Labs" A fitting name I suppose.

Here is a Picture of the Voyager I and the Launch and the Logo all in one
